name: codecoveragecomparerbt
description: Compare code coverage with previous build
helpMarkDown: Allows you to automatically monitor the code coverage and fail a build if it doesn't comply to the configured standards.
author: davesmits

inputs.name: codecoveragetarget
inputs.label: Code Coverage Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: The code coverage **may** become lower than the previous build but **not** get any lower than the target value. _(Set this value to 100 if you want to be hated by your team)_

inputs.name: codecoveragemeasurementmethod
inputs.label: Code Coverage Measurement Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: The way code coverage is calculated.
